text: DON!! x1 On Your Opponent's Attack If you have 5 or less active DON!! cards on your field, you may rest any number of your active DON!! cards. Up to 1 of your Leader or {Straw Hat Crew} type Characters gain +2000 power for each DON!! that was rested by this effect.
